rows.label: qst101106_msg001
rows.name: クエストクリアトーク(仮)

rows.label: qst101106_msg0001
rows.name:
Ohh! That must've been heavy!
Thanks for lugging it all the way here!

rows.label: qst101106_msg0002
rows.name:
With this I'll definitely be able to
make the finest furniture Gula's
ever seen, and on schedule too!

rows.label: qst101106_msg0003
rows.name:
I've got a thing or two to say to that
uppity little Superbian, but...

rows.label: qst101106_msg0004
rows.name:
*sigh* Well, that's no reason to do
a shoddy job, am I right? I've got my
pride, as any artisan should.

rows.label: qst101106_msg0005
rows.name:
I know that every craftsman
in Trigo feels the same way.

rows.label: qst101106_msg0006
rows.name:
Thank you, friends.
Truly, I am in your debt.

rows.label: qst101106_msg0007
rows.name:
I don't want to think where I'd be
if I hadn't talked to you back then...

rows.label: qst101106_msg0008
rows.name:
If at the end of your road you decide
to settle down somewhere, I'll be
honored to make you an armoire!
